Habitat augmentation - vegetation corridor/patch establishment to improve connectivity
Habitat augmentation - increased seed collection and storage
Habitat augmentation - instream habitat improvement eg. Log/snag reinstatement, fish 'hotels'

Habitat improvement/regeneration - grazing management to improve groundcover

Species management - establishing and maintaining captive breeding programs

columns.name: shortTermAchieved

columns.description: SMART outcome being reported against, as per the MERI Plan.
columns.name: mediumTermAchieved

items.source: Please complete the questions in this form for each short term outcome statement in the project MERI plan

items.preLabel: 1. Outcome Statement

items.source:
2. Investment priorities - indicators, threats and interventions

For each investment priority relevant to this project outcome, please answer the following questions. You can add another investment priority using the button at the end of the investment priority questions

items.preLabel: Investment priority
Outcome indicator
Key project service, intervention or activity
Additional services, interventions or activities
Can you quantify the level of achievement of your outcome statement against a baseline?
Effectiveness
Efficiency
Legacy
Appropriateness
Explain why not

items.source:
3. What data supports the response to Question 2?

Provide a data summary for each data set that supports your selected level of change against a baseline in Question 2. Each of your outcome statements and investment priority/s will have a data set or data sets. Only provide a summary for data sets collected under the outcome statement selected in Question 1 and the investment priority/s relevant to that outcome statement. You can provide data sets from multiple sources to support your level of change.

items.preLabel: Data set name
Data set focus
4. To what extent were the Program Logic assumptions underpinning the outcome statement accurate and/or inaccurate?
5. What have been the key enablers to achieving this outcome statement?
6. What have been the key barriers to achieving this outcome statement?
KEQ
KEQ2 - How and to what extent has the project increased knowledge of best practice NRM for the investment priority?
KEQ3 - Were the methods/strategies used the best way to achieve/maximise the outcomes or are there other methods/strategies that might be more effective?
KEQ4 - To what extent has the project risk assessment and risk management been appropriate and effective?

KEQ5 - If your project engages with Traditional Owners, how and by what means has this project improved the capacity of Traditional Owners to lead or assist with the management of the investment priority?
KEQ6 - Have there been any unexpected or unintended (positive or negative) changes or other outcomes delivered by this project and what are they?
KEQ7 - What elements of the project could be improved to maximise efficiency (and value for money)?
KEQ8 - How and to what extent has the project achieved the desired behavioural change and ongoing commitment among the participating land managers towards the investment priority?
KEQ9 - What evidence is there that the outcomes will be maintained? How will they be maintained and by whom?
KEQ10 - Is there any additional information or data you wish to provide that you have used to evaluate the success of the project?
